about.label: About Your Guide
about.title: Your
about.intro: Hi! I'm Ricardo, your dedicated guide to experiencing the real Cuba. Born and raised in Havana, I've spent over 25 years helping travelers discover the authentic beauty, rich culture, and warm spirit of my island.
about.description: From the colorful streets of Old Havana to the pristine beaches of Varadero, from the tobacco fields of Viñales to the colonial charm of Trinidad, I know every corner of Cuba like the back of my hand. My mission is to create personalized experiences that go beyond typical tourist routes.
